items.preText: 2.10pm Chris Gayle and Evin Lewis are the openers for West Indies and they will have their task cut out. Mashrafe to bowl the first over. Just the one slip in place. Soham Basak: "About transforming their game - a change of format can automatically do that. The same will happen with RSA in SL in the ODIs, I'm sure." -- Not always. Ask Australia post the South Africa horror earlier this year. Chris M: "I feel like this is slightly above par but could've been so much better with the platform set at about 35 overs and Bangladesh's stacked batting. Who knows with unpredictable Windies, they could be all our for 150 or chase it in 40 overs " 1.50pm A side that didn't last five days combined across two Tests suddenly transformed their game like they'd used a magic wand. Akshay's taking a breather. I'm going to take you through to drinks. We're still 10 minutes away from a resumption
items.text: floats this full on leg stump, Gayle defends to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: bunts this to short cover and scampers a run. 'That's a sight to behold', thunders Ian Bishop on commentary. Totally
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: thick inside edge to square leg.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: nice and full, just slanted across towards off stump, defended towards mid-off.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: stands tall and punches this to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: crisp drive, there's a half-stop at cover but they won't take a run. Tight first over from Mash.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: beats Gayle straightaway with one that drifts in and spins away.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: drifts in, Gayle defends to the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: lunges forward and defends this tossed up delivery
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.preText: Long-off and deep midwicket are the two men out
items.text: steered gently towards short third man, big mix up, better throw from Rubel and Lewis would've been run out at the striker's end
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: defended down the ground to mid-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: eased with the spin to cover.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: slower length ball on middle and leg, defended towards midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: length ball, squared up a touch as he defends to point. Excellent from Mash, no width to free his arms, not full enough to swing freely.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.text: touch full on off, defended
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, no run

items.preText: Mid-on goes back. Third man in
items.text: mistimes a punch to mid-off as he takes a quick single. Everything okay with the world? What's with Gayle and quick singles today, I wonder.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: tight line, length just around off, punched to cover.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: he's whacked this into the stands at deep backward square leg. Mash dropped this short and was duly punished. Pulled imperiously. That should get West Indies moving.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, SIX runs

items.text: drifting into middle and off. Defended.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: steps out, he cleverly drops short, Gayle steers to point. Beaten in flight nearly
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: drives to get a thick inside edge into the leg side, another quick single.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: right forward and blocks this into the off side.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: drifting down leg, swept past short fine for a couple. Not where he intended though.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, 2 runs

items.text: rocks back and cuts to cover point.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: slants a length ball across, Gayle bunts it to mid-off. No prizes for guessing what he did next.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run
